content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://library.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Paper Book Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" provides resources for self-education such as books covering various areas of IT and soft skills topics. Select the book you are interested in and click <Order it>. After that your request will be automatically redirected to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFALibraryBY@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for further processing. The Library manager will contact you to specify the lending period and the place where the book can be picked up.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":113126,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/dcb0a6cb-e61b-4b0a-b017-7a786a6b16d3/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/dcb0a6cb-e61b-4b0a-b017-7a786a6b16d3/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"dcb0a6cb-e61b-4b0a-b017-7a786a6b16d3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":432,\"height\":350},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please keep in mind that COVID-19 situation has led to decrease in expenses for library budget in 2020-2021. For this reason, we had a limited number of new arrivals. The financing of the paper library is currently stopped. The focus has been changed from paper books to e-books of external libraries which provide users with 24/7 access to the digital collection of eBooks. There are different kinds of limitations in the service provided by external vendor. Further details can be found on KB pages such as \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/LitRes+digital+library\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LitRes\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/O%27Reilly+Platform\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Oâ€™reilly\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/getAbstract+digital+library\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GetAbsract\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At present \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://media.epam.com/index.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is considered to be a storage where only Project Back Ups and the archive of corporate events held over the years are stored. To select the materials you are interested in use the catalog on the menu on the left, then click <Insert Disk Into CD-ROM>.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":114695,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/31dd435b-440f-4ac1-b994-7734d4d3ba94/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/31dd435b-440f-4ac1-b994-7734d4d3ba94/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"31dd435b-440f-4ac1-b994-7734d4d3ba94\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":936,\"height\":391.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Library Manager will provide you with a link via the corporate mail to get access to the requested materials.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions regarding this section, address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFALibraryBY@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Library BY\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
